engChrName: Whoa... This path is so pretty.
engSearchText: Whoa... This path is so pretty.
jpnChrName: わあっ……キレイですねぇ。
jpnSearchText: わあっ……キレイですねぇ。

engChrName: The autumn leaves look beautiful. The cosmos seem to be at their peak, too.
engSearchText:
The autumn leaves look beautiful. The cosmos seem
to be at their peak, too.
jpnChrName: ちょうど紅葉の季節…… 秋桜（コスモス）も見頃のようですね。
jpnSearchText:
ちょうど紅葉の季節……
秋桜（コスモス）も見頃のようですね。

engChrName: Yes. It almost feels like a waste to keep it sealed off.
engSearchText: Yes. It almost feels like a waste to keep it sealed off.
jpnChrName: はい、閉鎖されているのが 勿体ないくらいですけど……
jpnSearchText:
はい、閉鎖されているのが
勿体ないくらいですけど……

engChrName: M-Monsters...? But there weren't any here seven years ago.
engSearchText:
M-Monsters...? But there weren't any here seven
years ago.
jpnChrName: あ、あれは魔獣か…… ７年前には居なかったのに。
jpnSearchText:
あ、あれは魔獣か……
７年前には居なかったのに。

engChrName: We're gonna have more than just those little ones to deal with, too.
engSearchText:
We're gonna have more than just those little ones to
deal with, too.
jpnChrName: ハッ……どうやら それだけじゃないみたいだがなァ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……どうやら
それだけじゃないみたいだがなァ。

engChrName: ...What?
engSearchText: ...What?
jpnChrName: え。
jpnSearchText: え。

engChrName: Warning! Warning! Large enemy presence detected!
engSearchText: Warning! Warning! Large enemy presence detected!
jpnChrName: 警告、警告！ センサーニ大型ノ敵性反応！
jpnSearchText:
警告、警告！
センサーニ大型ノ敵性反応！

engChrName: Well, THAT doesn't sound good...
engSearchText: Well, THAT doesn't sound good...
jpnChrName: ええっ、どういうことだ！？
jpnSearchText: ええっ、どういうことだ！？

engChrName: That must be where the monster that rules this area is.
engSearchText:
That must be where the monster that rules this
area is.
jpnChrName: 何らかの大型魔獣── “ヌシ”がいるみたいだね。
jpnSearchText:
何らかの大型魔獣──
“ヌシ”がいるみたいだね。

engChrName: Van.
engSearchText: Van.
jpnChrName: ……ヴァンさん。
jpnSearchText: ……ヴァンさん。

engChrName: I was thinkin' the same thing. This might be our perfect chance.
engSearchText:
I was thinkin' the same thing. This might be our
perfect chance.
jpnChrName: ああ── お誂（あつら）え向きかもしれねえな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ──
お誂（あつら）え向きかもしれねえな。

engChrName: ...If we must, we at least need to make sure we're ready first.
engSearchText:
...If we must, we at least need to make sure we're
ready first.
jpnChrName: っ…… でしたら慎重に準備しましょう。
jpnSearchText:
っ……
でしたら慎重に準備しましょう。

engChrName: What will you do, Mr. Lugan? I suspect it will be safer for you to wait here at the entrance.
engSearchText:
What will you do, Mr. Lugan? I suspect it will be
safer for you to wait here at the entrance.
jpnChrName: マクシム様はどうなさいますか？ 入口でお待ち頂いた方が良さそうですが。
jpnSearchText:
マクシム様はどうなさいますか？
入口でお待ち頂いた方が良さそうですが。

engChrName: I could never do that! This memory means the world to me—I can't just leave it to you to recover it!
engSearchText:
I could never do that! This memory means the world
to me—I can't just leave it to you to recover it!
jpnChrName: ！　いやいや、大切な思い出を 君たちだけに任せるつもりはない！
jpnSearchText:
！　いやいや、大切な思い出を
君たちだけに任せるつもりはない！

engChrName: I'm confident in my reflexes and agility, if nothing else. So please, let me come with you.
engSearchText:
I'm confident in my reflexes and agility, if
nothing else. So please, let me come with you.
jpnChrName: 運動能力と反射神経には自信がある。 できれば同行させてくれ。
jpnSearchText:
運動能力と反射神経には自信がある。
できれば同行させてくれ。

engChrName: Works for me. I think you'll be fine. Just keep hold of this for me, would ya?
engSearchText:
Works for me. I think you'll be fine. Just keep hold of
this for me, would ya?
jpnChrName: ま、アンタなら大丈夫だろ。 ──こいつを一応持っときな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、アンタなら大丈夫だろ。
──こいつを一応持っときな。

engChrName: The shovel for digging up the capsule? O-Okay. Sure.
engSearchText: The shovel for digging up the capsule? O-Okay. Sure.
jpnChrName: カプセルを掘り起こすための…… わ、分かった。
jpnSearchText:
カプセルを掘り起こすための……
わ、分かった。

engChrName: Use it if you gotta defend yourself, but don't be reckless. Stay behind us.
engSearchText:
Use it if you gotta defend yourself, but don't
be reckless. Stay behind us.
jpnChrName: あくまで護身用だ。 シロートは前に出んじゃねーぞ。
jpnSearchText:
あくまで護身用だ。
シロートは前に出んじゃねーぞ。

engChrName: It's just a precaution, though. Leave all the monsters to us!
engSearchText:
It's just a precaution, though. Leave all the monsters
to us!
jpnChrName: 魔獣はわたしたちが片付けますから 安心して付いてきてくださいっ。
jpnSearchText:
魔獣はわたしたちが片付けますから
安心して付いてきてくださいっ。

engChrName: There it is! That's the tree—I'm sure of it!
engSearchText: There it is! That's the tree—I'm sure of it!
jpnChrName: あの樹だよ、間違いない……！
jpnSearchText: あの樹だよ、間違いない……！

engChrName: Is the capsule buried under that stone, then?
engSearchText: Is the capsule buried under that stone, then?
jpnChrName: あ……もしかしてあれが？
jpnSearchText: あ……もしかしてあれが？

engChrName: So, what? This some monument for braindead lovebirds?
engSearchText:
So, what? This some monument for
braindead lovebirds?
jpnChrName: お花畑のバカップルどもが 愛の証を埋めた石碑ってか？
jpnSearchText:
お花畑のバカップルどもが
愛の証を埋めた石碑ってか？

engChrName: H-How dare you? It is under that monument, but still!
engSearchText:
H-How dare you? It is under that monument,
but still!
jpnChrName: お、お花畑でもバカップルでもないっ！ 確かにあの石碑の下にカプセルを──
jpnSearchText:
お、お花畑でもバカップルでもないっ！
確かにあの石碑の下にカプセルを──

engChrName: ...What's that sound?
engSearchText: ...What's that sound?
jpnChrName: この音って……？
jpnSearchText: この音って……？

engChrName: Get back, champ!
engSearchText: Get back, champ!
jpnChrName: 下がってな、チャンピオン！
jpnSearchText: 下がってな、チャンピオン！

engChrName: What is THAT?! A-A giant spider?!
engSearchText: What is THAT?! A-A giant spider?!
jpnChrName: なああああああっ！？ ク、クモぉ……！？
jpnSearchText:
なああああああっ！？
ク、クモぉ……！？

engChrName: One giant spider and six smaller ones!
engSearchText: One giant spider and six smaller ones!
jpnChrName: 巨大蜘蛛１、子蜘蛛６！
jpnSearchText: 巨大蜘蛛１、子蜘蛛６！

engChrName: I suspect they'll be a force to be reckoned with!
engSearchText: I suspect they'll be a force to be reckoned with!
jpnChrName: かなりの戦闘力と推定します！
jpnSearchText: かなりの戦闘力と推定します！

engChrName: Van! Agnès!
engSearchText: Van! Agnès!
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、アニエスさんも……！
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん、アニエスさんも……！

engChrName: I have the Geneses right here!
engSearchText: I have the Geneses right here!
jpnChrName: ……っ、ゲネシスはここに！
jpnSearchText: ……っ、ゲネシスはここに！

engChrName: There's no need to hold back against it! Just wear it down some and leave the rest to me!
engSearchText:
There's no need to hold back against it! Just wear it
down some and leave the rest to me!
jpnChrName: 手加減の必要はねえ── ある程度まで削ったら俺に任せろ！
jpnSearchText:
手加減の必要はねえ──
ある程度まで削ったら俺に任せろ！

engChrName: Fine by me. Leave it to us!
engSearchText: Fine by me. Leave it to us!
jpnChrName: ハッ、面倒くせえが頼まれてやるよ！
jpnSearchText: ハッ、面倒くせえが頼まれてやるよ！

engChrName: Eeek! How is it still moving?!
engSearchText: Eeek! How is it still moving?!
jpnChrName: ひいいっ……！ ま、まだ動くのかっ！？
jpnSearchText:
ひいいっ……！
ま、まだ動くのかっ！？

engChrName: Get back behind us!
engSearchText: Get back behind us!
jpnChrName: 下がってな、オッサン！
jpnSearchText: 下がってな、オッサン！

engChrName: Van! Are you ready?
engSearchText: Van! Are you ready?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、行けますかっ！？
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん、行けますかっ！？

engChrName: Yeah. I'm counting on you guys!
engSearchText: Yeah. I'm counting on you guys!
jpnChrName: ああ──カトル、リゼット。 アニエスも頼む……！
jpnSearchText:
ああ──カトル、リゼット。
アニエスも頼む……！

engChrName: Right! Start the recording, FIO!
engSearchText: Right! Start the recording, FIO!
jpnChrName: 了解──ＦＩＯ、記録開始！
jpnSearchText: 了解──ＦＩＯ、記録開始！

engChrName: I'll back you up however I can!
engSearchText: I'll back you up however I can!
jpnChrName: サポートはお任せを！
jpnSearchText: サポートはお任せを！

engChrName: Please be careful, Van!
engSearchText: Please be careful, Van!
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん── どうか気をつけて下さい！
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさん──
どうか気をつけて下さい！

engChrName: Wh-What in Aidios' name is he doing?
engSearchText: Wh-What in Aidios' name is he doing?
jpnChrName: か、彼は何をしてるんだ！？
jpnSearchText: か、彼は何をしてるんだ！？

engChrName: Why are you all just standing there? There's no way he can take much more of this!
engSearchText:
Why are you all just standing there? There's no way
he can take much more of this!
jpnChrName: 君たちもどうして── あのままじゃ保たないぞっ！？
jpnSearchText:
君たちもどうして──
あのままじゃ保たないぞっ！？

engChrName: We know that!
engSearchText: We know that!
jpnChrName: もちろん分かってますっ……！
jpnSearchText: もちろん分かってますっ……！

engChrName: Just shut up and watch!
engSearchText: Just shut up and watch!
jpnChrName: 黙って見とけ！
jpnSearchText: 黙って見とけ！

engChrName: Mr. Arkride will be just fine. We believe in him.
engSearchText: Mr. Arkride will be just fine. We believe in him.
jpnChrName: ですが大丈夫です。 ヴァン様ならば、きっと──
jpnSearchText:
ですが大丈夫です。
ヴァン様ならば、きっと──

engChrName: (Oh, Goddess above...please keep him safe.)
engSearchText: (Oh, Goddess above...please keep him safe.)
jpnChrName: （女神よ……   ヴァンさんにご加護を……！）
jpnSearchText:
（女神よ……
ヴァンさんにご加護を……！）

engChrName: (NOW!)
engSearchText: (NOW!)

engChrName: This is it!
engSearchText: This is it!
jpnChrName: 来たっ──！
jpnSearchText: 来たっ──！

engChrName: Phase space expansion confirmed.
engSearchText: Phase space expansion confirmed.
jpnChrName: 位相空間ノ展開ヲ確認──
jpnSearchText: 位相空間ノ展開ヲ確認──

engChrName: And here we are.
engSearchText: And here we are.
jpnChrName: こいつは……
jpnSearchText: こいつは……

engChrName: We're inside, too?
engSearchText: We're inside, too?
jpnChrName: わ、わたしたちも……？
jpnSearchText: わ、わたしたちも……？

engChrName: ...Save for Mr. Lugan, it would seem.
engSearchText: ...Save for Mr. Lugan, it would seem.
jpnChrName: ……マクシム様は違うようですね。
jpnSearchText: ……マクシム様は違うようですね。

engChrName: Perhaps it's like the combat links used in the Empire? Or an application of the SCLM system?
engSearchText:
Perhaps it's like the combat links used in the Empire?
Or an application of the SCLM system?
jpnChrName: 帝国の戦術リンクと同じ……？ いや、ＳＣＬＭ（スクラム）を応用した──
jpnSearchText:
帝国の戦術リンクと同じ……？
いや、ＳＣＬＭ（スクラム）を応用した──

engChrName: You call, and I answeeer! ...Uh, what's going on?!
engSearchText: You call, and I answeeer! ...Uh, what's going on?!
jpnChrName: 呼ばれて飛び出て～ ───って何なのよっ！？
jpnSearchText:
呼ばれて飛び出て～
───って何なのよっ！？

engChrName: Mare!
engSearchText: Mare!
jpnChrName: メアちゃん……！
jpnSearchText: メアちゃん……！

engChrName: Heh. She finally shows up.
engSearchText: Heh. She finally shows up.
jpnChrName: ハッ、ノコノコ現れやがったな。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、ノコノコ現れやがったな。

engChrName: She really is cute...
engSearchText: She really is cute...
jpnChrName: やっぱり可愛い……
jpnSearchText: やっぱり可愛い……

engChrName: A hologram? No, it's more like our collective unconscious is being hacked through spiritual resonance.
engSearchText:
A hologram? No, it's more like our collective
unconscious is being hacked through
spiritual resonance.
jpnChrName: ホログラム、いや霊的共鳴による 集合無意識のハッキング……？
jpnSearchText:
ホログラム、いや霊的共鳴による
集合無意識のハッキング……？

engChrName: Indeed. She appears to be an AI powerful enough to perform the vast calculations that would require.
engSearchText:
Indeed. She appears to be an AI powerful enough to
perform the vast calculations that would require.
jpnChrName: ええ──その膨大な演算を 可能にする“強いＡＩ”でしょう。
jpnSearchText:
ええ──その膨大な演算を
可能にする“強いＡＩ”でしょう。

engChrName: You've saved us from a lotta close calls in the past, but I guess this is our first chance to have a proper talk.
engSearchText:
You've saved us from a lotta close calls in the past, but
I guess this is our first chance to have a proper talk.
jpnChrName: いつも世話になってるが、 まともに話すのは初めてか。
jpnSearchText:
いつも世話になってるが、
まともに話すのは初めてか。

engChrName: Just what are you, Mare-Bear? Why do you have a sense of self like this?
engSearchText:
Just what are you, Mare-Bear? Why do you have a
sense of self like this?
jpnChrName: ──お前は何だ、メア公？ どうして“自我”を持っている？
jpnSearchText:
──お前は何だ、メア公？
どうして“自我”を持っている？

engChrName: Will you stop calling me that?! Besides, you know who I am!
engSearchText:
Will you stop calling me that?! Besides, you know
who I am!
jpnChrName: そ、そのメア公ってのは止めてよ！ アタシはアタシに決まってるでしょ。
jpnSearchText:
そ、そのメア公ってのは止めてよ！
アタシはアタシに決まってるでしょ。

engChrName: I'm your one-of-a-kind, fantabulous holo, Mare! Model MK-ESV004!
engSearchText:
I'm your one-of-a-kind, fantabulous holo, Mare!
Model MK-ESV004!
jpnChrName: スペシャルでマーベラスな専用ホロウ、 ＭＫ－ＥＳＶ００４《メア》。
jpnSearchText:
スペシャルでマーベラスな専用ホロウ、
ＭＫ－ＥＳＶ００４《メア》。

engChrName: I'm being gracious enough to lend you a helping hand as a ㌍㌫㌻㍊㍍ under the influence of the ㌍㌫㌻㍊㍍!
engSearchText:
I'm being gracious enough to lend you a helping
hand as a ㌍㌫㌻㍊㍍ under the influence of
the ㌍㌫㌻㍊㍍!
jpnChrName: ㌍㌫㍊㍍の影響を受けた㌍㌫㌻㍊㍍として、 わざわざ力を貸してあげてるだけよ。
jpnSearchText:
㌍㌫㍊㍍の影響を受けた㌍㌫㌻㍊㍍として、
わざわざ力を貸してあげてるだけよ。

engChrName: Wait... What?
engSearchText: Wait... What?
jpnChrName: そいつは……
jpnSearchText: そいつは……

engChrName: There was nothing to stop us hearing what she said, but even then, I just...couldn't comprehend it.
engSearchText:
There was nothing to stop us hearing what she said,
but even then, I just...couldn't comprehend it.
jpnChrName: 聞こえている筈なのに “認識”できない……！？
jpnSearchText:
聞こえている筈なのに
“認識”できない……！？

engChrName: Indeed... (I remember reading about this phenomenon in the reports from Crossbell and the Empire.)
engSearchText:
Indeed...
(I remember reading about this phenomenon in the
reports from Crossbell and the Empire.)
jpnChrName: これは……（帝国やクロスベルでの レポートにもあったという……）
jpnSearchText:
これは……（帝国やクロスベルでの
レポートにもあったという……）

engChrName: Ugh... This is so annoying.
engSearchText: Ugh... This is so annoying.
jpnChrName: あ～もう、じれったいわね。
jpnSearchText: あ～もう、じれったいわね。

engChrName: ...What's this? Are you recording what's happening here?
engSearchText:
...What's this? Are you recording what's
happening here?
jpnChrName: ──ってナニそれ、 この“場”を記録してるの？
jpnSearchText:
──ってナニそれ、
この“場”を記録してるの？

engChrName: That's right. We'd prefer to not have to go through all this every time we want to see you.
engSearchText:
That's right. We'd prefer to not have to go through
all this every time we want to see you.
jpnChrName: ……ああ、君と会うのに 毎度この調子というのも面倒だからね。
jpnSearchText:
……ああ、君と会うのに
毎度この調子というのも面倒だからね。

engChrName: So we were hoping there was a way to recreate the process and better control the Grendel without deliberately exposing Van to danger.
engSearchText:
So we were hoping there was a way to recreate the
process and better control the Grendel without
deliberately exposing Van to danger.
jpnChrName: グレンデル化──あの状態も制御しつつ 再現できないかと考えているんだ。
jpnSearchText:
グレンデル化──あの状態も制御しつつ
再現できないかと考えているんだ。

engChrName: I see. You humans do think of some fascinating ideas.
engSearchText: I see. You humans do think of some fascinating ideas.
jpnChrName: なるほど、人間ってのは 面白いことを考えつくモンねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど、人間ってのは
面白いことを考えつくモンねぇ。

engChrName: Even if your methods are a little primitive.
engSearchText: Even if your methods are a little primitive.
jpnChrName: ちょっと原始的すぎる方法だけど。
jpnSearchText: ちょっと原始的すぎる方法だけど。

engChrName: Fighting words for a fun-sized pipsqueak.
engSearchText: Fighting words for a fun-sized pipsqueak.
jpnChrName: ハッ、相変わらず クソ生意気なチビロリだな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、相変わらず
クソ生意気なチビロリだな。

engChrName: Y-You watch your mouth, redhead!
engSearchText: Y-You watch your mouth, redhead!
jpnChrName: だ、誰がチビロリよ赤毛っ！
jpnSearchText: だ、誰がチビロリよ赤毛っ！

engChrName: P-Please! This is no time for fighting!
engSearchText: P-Please! This is no time for fighting!
jpnChrName: ケ、ケンカしている場合じゃ ないですよ～！
jpnSearchText:
ケ、ケンカしている場合じゃ
ないですよ～！

engChrName: ...So you can do it, right?
engSearchText: ...So you can do it, right?
jpnChrName: ──ってことは、出来るんだな？
jpnSearchText: ──ってことは、出来るんだな？

engChrName: Please, Ms. Mare! We need your help!
engSearchText: Please, Ms. Mare! We need your help!
jpnChrName: あの、どうか力を貸してください、 メアちゃん！
jpnSearchText:
あの、どうか力を貸してください、
メアちゃん！

engChrName: And now we've tacked on 'miss'... Well, whatever.
engSearchText: And now we've tacked on 'miss'... Well, whatever.
jpnChrName: ちゃんって……まあいいわ。
jpnSearchText: ちゃんって……まあいいわ。

engChrName: Just be careful. Using it too much will cause ㌍㌫㌻㍊㌫㍊㌻㍊㌫㍍.
engSearchText:
Just be careful. Using it too much will
cause ㌍㌫㌻㍊㌫㍊㌻㍊㌫㍍.
jpnChrName: ──言っておくけど過度な使用は ㌍㌫㌻㍊㌫㍊㌻㍊㌫㍍になるから。
jpnSearchText:
──言っておくけど過度な使用は
㌍㌫㌻㍊㌫㍊㌻㍊㌫㍍になるから。

engChrName: As long as you're mindful of that, go ahead and decipher the recreation process from your logs later.
engSearchText:
As long as you're mindful of that, go ahead and
decipher the recreation process from your logs later.
jpnChrName: 後でその子のログから 再現プロセスは解析するのね。
jpnSearchText:
後でその子のログから
再現プロセスは解析するのね。

jpnSearchText:
自分がない人間にはそんな芯はありませんから。
私にできるのはそこにある役を演じることだけ。

engChrName: That's...all I can ever do.
engSearchText: That's...all I can ever do.
jpnChrName: しかしそれでは……
jpnSearchText: しかしそれでは……

engChrName: 'She's extremely transparent while acting. So much so that you might see right through her—and her hollow acting.'
engSearchText:
'She's extremely transparent while acting. So much so
that you might see right through her—and her
hollow acting.'
jpnChrName: 『あまりにも透明──   見方によっては空虚にも感じる』
jpnSearchText:
『あまりにも透明──
見方によっては空虚にも感じる』

engChrName: I remember readin' that on a magazine after your debut film aired.
engSearchText:
I remember readin' that on a magazine after your
debut film aired.
jpnChrName: ……お前さんがデビューしたての頃、 映画雑誌とかでも書かれていたっけな。
jpnSearchText:
……お前さんがデビューしたての頃、
映画雑誌とかでも書かれていたっけな。

engChrName: You have a good memory.
engSearchText: You have a good memory.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、ご存じでしたか……
jpnSearchText: ふふっ、ご存じでしたか……

engChrName: You know that just 'cause someone said that doesn't mean it's true, right?
engSearchText:
You know that just 'cause someone said that doesn't
mean it's true, right?
jpnChrName: 一部にそう評価する人間もいるってだけだろ。
jpnSearchText: 一部にそう評価する人間もいるってだけだろ。

engChrName: If that's how people see you, then that's a talent you should take in stride.
engSearchText:
If that's how people see you, then that's a talent you
should take in stride.
jpnChrName: 逆にそんな言葉を使うくらい お前さんの演技には凄みがあるとも言える。
jpnSearchText:
逆にそんな言葉を使うくらい
お前さんの演技には凄みがあるとも言える。

engChrName: But...
engSearchText: But...
jpnChrName: それでも……
jpnSearchText: それでも……

engChrName: ...You can call my acting skills whatever you want, but the truth is I'll never measure up to Judith.
engSearchText:
...You can call my acting skills whatever you want, but
the truth is I'll never measure up to Judith.
jpnChrName: やっぱり私には、 先輩のような“本物”には……
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり私には、
先輩のような“本物”には……

engChrName: And that might be your problem right there. If you really think there's nothin' in there, then that's all the more space to start fillin' in.
engSearchText:
And that might be your problem right there. If you
really think there's nothin' in there, then that's all the
more space to start fillin' in.
jpnChrName: その“芯”がないってのが 問題だっていうんなら。
jpnSearchText:
その“芯”がないってのが
問題だっていうんなら。

engChrName: There's still plenty of time for you to create the identity you think you're lacking.
engSearchText:
There's still plenty of time for you to create the
identity you think you're lacking.
jpnChrName: ──お前さんの“本物”は これから見つけていきゃあいい。
jpnSearchText:
──お前さんの“本物”は
これから見つけていきゃあいい。

engChrName: You got a lotta material to take inspiration from.
engSearchText: You got a lotta material to take inspiration from.
jpnChrName: 今まで得てきた物を総動員してでもな。
jpnSearchText: 今まで得てきた物を総動員してでもな。

engChrName: What do you mean?
engSearchText: What do you mean?
jpnChrName: 今まで、得てきた物……？
jpnSearchText: 今まで、得てきた物……？

engChrName: You're well known for not just takin' a script and listening to it to a T. You always take it a step further.
engSearchText:
You're well known for not just takin' a script and
listening to it to a T. You always take it a step further.
jpnChrName: 台本に書かれてるセリフや動きだけじゃねぇ、 その“役”を演じて演じて演じきって──
jpnSearchText:
台本に書かれてるセリフや動きだけじゃねぇ、
その“役”を演じて演じて演じきって──

engChrName: You wrap yourself in the role and let it become who you are. You think and act like the characters would.
engSearchText:
You wrap yourself in the role and let it become who
you are. You think and act like the characters would.
jpnChrName: “役そのもの”になっちまえるのがお前さんだ。
jpnSearchText: “役そのもの”になっちまえるのがお前さんだ。

engChrName: That's not somethin' you just up and forget.
engSearchText: That's not somethin' you just up and forget.
jpnChrName: その役が生きてきた人生、積んできた経験、思想── 役をやってる間は“実感”としてあるんだろう？
jpnSearchText:
その役が生きてきた人生、積んできた経験、思想──
役をやってる間は“実感”としてあるんだろう？

engChrName: Or do their lives and experiences just vanish from your head after you stop playin' the role?
engSearchText:
Or do their lives and experiences just vanish from
your head after you stop playin' the role?
jpnChrName: 収録が終わって“ニナ”に戻ったら そいつは全部消えてなくなっちまうのか？
jpnSearchText:
収録が終わって“ニナ”に戻ったら
そいつは全部消えてなくなっちまうのか？

jpnChrName: それは……
jpnSearchText: それは……

engChrName: No, they don't. I remember everything.
engSearchText: No, they don't. I remember everything.
jpnChrName: ……いいえ、確かに覚えています。
jpnSearchText: ……いいえ、確かに覚えています。

engChrName: I remember the warmth of being in Ron's arms as Michelle in Wolves' Requiem.
engSearchText:
I remember the warmth of being in Ron's arms as
Michelle in Wolves' Requiem.
jpnChrName: 『狼たちの鎮魂歌』のミシェルが、 ロンの腕の中で感じた温かさを……
jpnSearchText:
『狼たちの鎮魂歌』のミシェルが、
ロンの腕の中で感じた温かさを……

engChrName: I still remember how reassuring it was to have my friends and companions at my side in Gloria as Sheena Dirke.
engSearchText:
I still remember how reassuring it was to have my
friends and companions at my side in Gloria as
Sheena Dirke.
jpnChrName: 『ＧＬＯＲＩＡ』のシーナ・ディルクが、 肩を並べる仲間たちに感じていた頼もしさを。
jpnSearchText:
『ＧＬＯＲＩＡ』のシーナ・ディルクが、
肩を並べる仲間たちに感じていた頼もしさを。

engChrName: Yeah, thought so. You remember all of that so clearly.
engSearchText: Yeah, thought so. You remember all of that so clearly.
jpnChrName: そういうのがお前さんに凄まじい解像度で フィードバックされてるとしたら。
jpnSearchText:
そういうのがお前さんに凄まじい解像度で
フィードバックされてるとしたら。

engChrName: And that's not somethin' just everyone can do. Not even Judith. Those voices—those feelings are just as much a part of you. You ain't empty.
engSearchText:
And that's not somethin' just everyone can do.
Not even Judith. Those voices—those feelings are just
as much a part of you. You ain't empty.
jpnChrName: そいつはジュディスにも、他の誰にも 真似できないお前さん自身の“本物”だろう。
jpnSearchText:
そいつはジュディスにも、他の誰にも
真似できないお前さん自身の“本物”だろう。

engChrName: But don't let them overwhelm you, either. You gotta listen to what you want, too.
engSearchText:
But don't let them overwhelm you, either. You gotta
listen to what you want, too.
jpnChrName: だったらお前さんは思うままにやればいい。 役の声だけじゃなく、お前さん自身の声を聴いて。
jpnSearchText:
だったらお前さんは思うままにやればいい。
役の声だけじゃなく、お前さん自身の声を聴いて。

engChrName: And I might get shit for sayin' this, but to hell with the script. I think this should be more important to you.
engSearchText:
And I might get shit for sayin' this, but to hell with
the script. I think this should be more important
to you.
jpnChrName: 無責任に言っちまえば、脚本や台詞だって 無視してみるのもいいかもしれねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
無責任に言っちまえば、脚本や台詞だって
無視してみるのもいいかもしれねぇ。

engChrName: 'Cause it's somethin' that only you can do.
engSearchText: 'Cause it's somethin' that only you can do.
jpnChrName: それはお前さんにしかできないことじゃねえのか？ ──ニナ・フェンリィ。
jpnSearchText:
それはお前さんにしかできないことじゃねえのか？
──ニナ・フェンリィ。

engChrName: Heehee. I'd never even considered disregarding my lines.
engSearchText:
Heehee. I'd never even considered disregarding
my lines.
jpnChrName: ……ふふっ、脚本を無視ですか…… ……そんな事、考えたこともありませんでした。
jpnSearchText:
……ふふっ、脚本を無視ですか……
……そんな事、考えたこともありませんでした。

engChrName: That... That might actually be a good idea!
engSearchText: That... That might actually be a good idea!
jpnChrName: ……それは……それは、とても面白そうです……！
jpnSearchText: ……それは……それは、とても面白そうです……！

engChrName: Do you mind if I try the scene one more time? I might finally have something.
engSearchText:
Do you mind if I try the scene one more time?
I might finally have something.
jpnChrName: 今なら何か掴めそうな気がします。 アークライドさん、もう一度付き合ってくれますか？
jpnSearchText:
今なら何か掴めそうな気がします。
アークライドさん、もう一度付き合ってくれますか？

engChrName: And let's start from the very beginning this time!
engSearchText: And let's start from the very beginning this time!
jpnChrName: 今度はシーンの頭から！
jpnSearchText: 今度はシーンの頭から！

engChrName: Yeah, sure—wait. Already?!
engSearchText: Yeah, sure—wait. Already?!
jpnChrName: おう──ってマジかよ！？
jpnSearchText: おう──ってマジかよ！？

engChrName: And so they resumed their acting.
engSearchText: And so they resumed their acting.
jpnChrName: こうしてニナは練習を再開した。
jpnSearchText: <C1>こうしてニナは練習を再開した。

engChrName: Nina performed the scene over and over, Van still acting as her partner.
engSearchText:
Nina performed the scene over and over, Van still
acting as her partner.
jpnChrName: ヴァンを相手に、何度も何度も 同じシーンとセリフを繰り返し──
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンを相手に、何度も何度も
同じシーンとセリフを繰り返し──

engChrName: Every attempt refined the scene further, and Nina could feel the pleasant and satisfying exhaustion wash over her.
engSearchText:
Every attempt refined the scene further, and Nina
could feel the pleasant and satisfying exhaustion wash
over her.
jpnChrName: 演技が洗練されていくにつれて 心地いい疲労感が蓄積していった。
jpnSearchText:
演技が洗練されていくにつれて
心地いい疲労感が蓄積していった。

engChrName: Eventually...
engSearchText: Eventually...
jpnChrName: そして──
jpnSearchText: <C1>そして──

engChrName: This is the real me. The one you don't know—the one I don't want you to know.
engSearchText:
This is the real me. The one you don't know—the
one I don't want you to know.
jpnChrName: これが本当の私──貴方が知らない私、 貴方にだけは知られたくない私。
jpnSearchText:
これが本当の私──貴方が知らない私、
貴方にだけは知られたくない私。

engChrName: But I...I can't run anymore. Not if I'm going to stay true to myself!
engSearchText:
But I...I can't run anymore. Not if I'm going to stay
true to myself!
jpnChrName: だけど──私はもう、逃げない…… “私”が“私”であり続けるために……！
jpnSearchText:
だけど──私はもう、逃げない……
“私”が“私”であり続けるために……！

engChrName: Cuuuuuut!
engSearchText: Cuuuuuut!
jpnChrName: ──カーット！！
jpnSearchText: <S5>──カーット！！

engChrName: M-Mr. Lam?
engSearchText: M-Mr. Lam?
jpnChrName: ラ、ラム監督……？
jpnSearchText: ラ、ラム監督……？

engChrName: How long have y'all been there? Wait, were you filming this?
engSearchText:
How long have y'all been there? Wait, were you
filming this?
jpnChrName: いつの間に…… カメラも回してたみたいですね？
jpnSearchText:
いつの間に……
カメラも回してたみたいですね？

engChrName: Haha. Don't worry, we were only filming Nina.
engSearchText: Haha. Don't worry, we were only filming Nina.
jpnChrName: フフ、ニナ君の演技だけだがね。
jpnSearchText: フフ、ニナ君の演技だけだがね。

engChrName: That was spectacular, Nina. I know I approved our previous take, but this was significantly better.
engSearchText:
That was spectacular, Nina. I know I approved our
previous take, but this was significantly better.
jpnChrName: ──素晴らしい演技だった、ニナ君。 前に私がＯＫを出した時よりもずっとね。
jpnSearchText:
──素晴らしい演技だった、ニナ君。
前に私がＯＫを出した時よりもずっとね。

engChrName: You went off script a little, but that doesn't matter when I could feel you and your character's soul so perfectly in your delivery.
engSearchText:
You went off script a little, but that doesn't matter
when I could feel you and your character's soul so
perfectly in your delivery.
jpnChrName: 台本とは違っていたが間違いなく感じたよ。 それが役とニナ君の芯から来る台詞だと。
jpnSearchText:
台本とは違っていたが間違いなく感じたよ。
それが役とニナ君の芯から来る台詞だと。

engChrName: Th-Thank you, Director!
engSearchText: Th-Thank you, Director!
jpnChrName: ……！　ありがとうございます！
jpnSearchText: ……！　ありがとうございます！

engChrName: All right, everyone! Let's keep this momentum and get back to shooting!
engSearchText:
All right, everyone! Let's keep this momentum and
get back to shooting!
jpnChrName: さあ、この勢いのまま撮影を始めよう！ みんな、よろしく頼む！
jpnSearchText:
さあ、この勢いのまま撮影を始めよう！
みんな、よろしく頼む！

engChrName: Of course!
engSearchText: Of course!
jpnChrName: はいっ！！
jpnSearchText: <S5>はいっ！！

engChrName: Glad that's taken care of.
engSearchText: Glad that's taken care of.
jpnChrName: もう大丈夫そうだな？
jpnSearchText: もう大丈夫そうだな？

engChrName: Same. It's a relief. It feels like I finally saw a side of myself I'd never faced before.
engSearchText:
Same. It's a relief. It feels like I finally saw a side of
myself I'd never faced before.
jpnChrName: はいっ…… いつもと違う自分に会えた気がします。
jpnSearchText:
はいっ……
いつもと違う自分に会えた気がします。

engChrName: Thank you so, so much for your help!
engSearchText: Thank you so, so much for your help!
jpnChrName: 本当にありがとうございました、アークライドさん……！
jpnSearchText: 本当にありがとうございました、アークライドさん……！

engChrName: They parted ways, Van leaving Nina and her crew to their filming.
engSearchText:
They parted ways, Van leaving Nina and her crew to
their filming.
jpnChrName: その後、撮影を始めるニナたちと別れ、 活動を再開するのだった。
jpnSearchText:
その後、撮影を始めるニナたちと別れ、
活動を再開するのだった。

engChrName: Well then, Van? Will you bear the nightmare? Or not?
engSearchText:
Well then, Van? Will you bear the nightmare?
Or not?
jpnChrName: それじゃあヴァン── 悪夢を纏う、纏わない？
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあヴァン──
悪夢を纏う、纏わない？

engChrName: I will.
engSearchText: I will.
jpnChrName: ああ（Yes）──
jpnSearchText: ああ（Yes）──

engChrName: I'll bear it.
engSearchText: I'll bear it.
jpnChrName: ──纏うぜ（I Take it）。
jpnSearchText: ──纏うぜ（I Take it）。

engChrName: These fragile chains guide me to this realm, where I am now made manifest.
engSearchText:
These fragile chains guide me to this realm, where I
am now made manifest.
jpnChrName: By the Lead of Fragile Chain, I'm Existing Here（か細き“鎖”を導に今ここに現界せん）──
jpnSearchText: By the Lead of Fragile Chain, I'm Existing Here（か細き“鎖”を導に今ここに現界せん）──

engChrName: I am both the nightmare, and the beast that devours it!
engSearchText:
I am both the nightmare, and the beast that
devours it!
jpnChrName: I am Nightmare, I am Grendel Biting Myself（我は悪夢にして、また悪夢を喰い破る獣なり）…!!
jpnSearchText: I am Nightmare, I am Grendel Biting Myself（我は悪夢にして、また悪夢を喰い破る獣なり）…!!

engChrName: A fearsome foe is prowling around.
engSearchText: A fearsome foe is prowling around.
jpnChrName: 大型の魔獣が周囲を威圧している。
jpnSearchText: <C1>大型の魔獣が周囲を威圧している。

engChrName: Found  .
engSearchText:
Found
.
jpnChrName: 手配魔獣が{CC_ITEM=ITEM_ARTSDRIVER_021}を落とした。
jpnSearchText: 手配魔獣が{CC_ITEM=ITEM_ARTSDRIVER_021}を落とした。

engChrName: Found  .
engSearchText:
Found
.
jpnChrName: 手配魔獣が{CC_ITEM=ITEM_USE_CP_200}を落とした。
jpnSearchText: 手配魔獣が{CC_ITEM=ITEM_USE_CP_200}を落とした。

engChrName: Quest Pest Control at the Park completed!
engSearchText: Quest Pest Control at the Park completed!
jpnChrName: クエスト【記念公園・森林区画の手配魔獣】を達成した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>クエスト【<C2>記念公園・森林区画の手配魔獣<C1>】を達成した！

engChrName: Received
engSearchText: Received
jpnChrName: 報酬としてミラの振り込みを確認した。
jpnSearchText: 報酬として<C2><C0>ミラの振り込みを確認した。

engChrName: I finally found you, Jess.
engSearchText: I finally found you, Jess.
jpnChrName: ジェス……ここにいたのか。
jpnSearchText: ジェス……ここにいたのか。

engChrName: This is where you were, huh.
engSearchText: This is where you were, huh.
jpnChrName: ……ビンゴだな。
jpnSearchText: ……ビンゴだな。

engChrName: Raymond? Van?
engSearchText: Raymond? Van?
jpnChrName: レイモンドに……ヴァンさん？
jpnSearchText: レイモンドに……ヴァンさん？

engChrName: Oh, I see. You must've asked for his help finding me.
engSearchText: Oh, I see. You must've asked for his help finding me.
jpnChrName: そうか、ヴァンさんに頼んでここへ……
jpnSearchText: そうか、ヴァンさんに頼んでここへ……

engChrName: Haha, you're really good at tracking people down, aren't you?
engSearchText:
Haha, you're really good at tracking people down,
aren't you?
jpnChrName: はは、流石の追跡力ですね。
jpnSearchText: はは、流石の追跡力ですね。

engChrName: Sorry, but work's work.
engSearchText: Sorry, but work's work.
jpnChrName: 悪いが、これも依頼なんでな。
jpnSearchText: 悪いが、これも依頼なんでな。

engChrName: Should we leave you guys to it?
engSearchText: Should we leave you guys to it?
jpnChrName: 俺たちは外そうか？
jpnSearchText: 俺たちは外そうか？

engChrName: Actually, could you stay here?
engSearchText: Actually, could you stay here?
jpnChrName: いえ……どうか立ち会って下さい。
jpnSearchText: いえ……どうか立ち会って下さい。

engChrName: I have a feeling that Jess is just gonna dodge my questions if it's just us two here.
engSearchText:
I have a feeling that Jess is just gonna dodge my
questions if it's just us two here.
jpnChrName: ここで二人きりになっても、 ジェスにはぐらかされそうな気がするので。
jpnSearchText:
ここで二人きりになっても、
ジェスにはぐらかされそうな気がするので。

engChrName: All right. If that's what the client wants, that's what the client gets.
engSearchText:
All right. If that's what the client wants, that's what
the client gets.
jpnChrName: ま、依頼者がそう言うなら せいぜい見守らせてもらおうか。
jpnSearchText:
ま、依頼者がそう言うなら
せいぜい見守らせてもらおうか。

engChrName: I'll get right to the point, then.
engSearchText: I'll get right to the point, then.
jpnChrName: さっそくだけど、ジェス。
jpnSearchText: さっそくだけど、ジェス。

engChrName: Why did you do this, Jess? Why would you just disappear all of a sudden, only leaving us a note?
engSearchText:
Why did you do this, Jess? Why would you just
disappear all of a sudden, only leaving us a note?
jpnChrName: どうして君は、あんな置手紙一つで 僕と姉さんの前から姿を消そうとしたんだい。
jpnSearchText:
どうして君は、あんな置手紙一つで
僕と姉さんの前から姿を消そうとしたんだい。

engChrName: Did you never think that might've been cruel?
engSearchText: Did you never think that might've been cruel?
jpnChrName: はっきり言わせてもらうけど── 少し薄情なんじゃないか？
jpnSearchText:
はっきり言わせてもらうけど──
少し薄情なんじゃないか？

engChrName: Yeah, you're right. I'm sorry.
engSearchText: Yeah, you're right. I'm sorry.
jpnChrName: そうだね、君の言う通りだ。
jpnSearchText: そうだね、君の言う通りだ。

engChrName: But I didn't know what else to do. I'm such a coward...
engSearchText:
But I didn't know what else to do. I'm such
a coward...
jpnChrName: けど僕は……臆病者だから。
jpnSearchText: けど僕は……臆病者だから。

engChrName: Jess...
engSearchText: Jess...
jpnChrName: ジェス……
jpnSearchText: ジェス……

engChrName: If this is because of Carol—
engSearchText: If this is because of Carol—
jpnChrName: 君がもし姉さんの気持ちを 知ったことで悩んでるのなら……
jpnSearchText:
君がもし姉さんの気持ちを
知ったことで悩んでるのなら……

real, and it's worth fighting for.

Did you really think I'd be uncomfortable around you
if I knew how you felt?

you thought.

I caused this in the first place...
